overview: Mr CHARLES EDMUND WILKINSON is a solicitor who retired from Lawrence Graham LLP in March 2005. At Lawrence Graham he specialised in corporate finance and commercial law and latterly concentrated on investment trust and fund work. He is chairman of both Asset Management Investment Company PLC and European Utilities Trust plc (both investment trusts) and is a director of Landore Resources Ltd (a Guernsey based mining exploration company) and Summit Germany Limited (a Guernsey based company investing in commercial property in Germany).
